dcterms:creator: S. Furkan Ozturk
Ziwei Liu
John D. Sutherland
Dimitar D. Sasselov
dcterms:description: The RAO dataset includes experimental results on the crystallization of ribose-aminooxazoline (RAO) on magnetized surfaces, demonstrating the chiral-induced spin selectivity effect and its implications for homochirality.
dcterms:title: RAO (Ribose-Aminooxazoline)

dcterms:creator: Joel Hurowitz
John Grotzinger
Woodward Fischer
S. McLennan
dcterms:description: The Authigenic Magnetite dataset provides insights into the redox stratification of an ancient lake in Gale crater, Mars, relevant for understanding the environmental conditions that may have influenced the origin of life.
dcterms:title: Authigenic Magnetite

dcterms:creator: John P Grotzinger
Do Y Sumner
LC Kah
K Stack
dcterms:description: The Curiosity Rover Data dataset includes geological and environmental data collected by the Curiosity rover in Gale Crater, Mars, providing context for the study of ancient habitable environments.
dcterms:title: Curiosity Rover Data

dcterms:creator: Scott M McLennan
RB Anderson
JF Bell III
John C Bridges
dcterms:description: The Gale Crater Sediments dataset provides elemental geochemistry data of sedimentary rocks at Yellowknife Bay, Gale Crater, Mars, which is crucial for understanding the geological history and potential for life.
dcterms:title: Gale Crater Sediments

dcterms:creator: Ron Naaman
Yossi Paltiel
David H Waldeck
dcterms:description: The Chiral-Induced Spin Selectivity (CISS) Effect dataset discusses the interaction between chiral molecules and electron spin, highlighting its significance in chemical processes.
dcterms:title: Chiral-Induced Spin Selectivity (CISS) Effect

dcterms:creator: M Kettner
B Gohler
H Zacharias
D Mishra
dcterms:description: The Spin-Filtering in Electron Transport dataset explores the phenomenon of spin filtering in electron transport through chiral oligopeptides, relevant for understanding spin-dependent processes.
dcterms:title: Spin-Filtering in Electron Transport

dcterms:creator: Debkumar Bhowmick
Yutao Sang
Kakali Santra
Maximilian Halbauer
dcterms:description: The Enantiomeric Resolution Using Magnetic Substrates dataset presents methods for achieving high-purity enantiomeric resolution of conglomerates using magnetic substrates.
dcterms:title: Enantiomeric Resolution Using Magnetic Substrates
